articles.title: ITC shares gain on ex-dividend day amid reports of hotels demerger proposal - The Economic Times
articles.description: Shares of ITC, India's conglomerate, have surged over 2% in intraday trade on Tuesday to Rs 449.85 per share, hitting multiple record highs in recent months. The company has proposed demerging its hotel business, which recorded a bumper revenue growth of 99% …
articles.content: Shares of ITC rose over 2% in intraday day trade on Tuesday at Rs 449.85 apiece on NSE. The shares have been on a continuous upward trend for the last few months and hit multiple record highs during … [+1715 chars]
